name: Organisation Europeenne des Constructeurs des Vehicules Accessibles
goal:
To represent the Wheelchair Accessible Vehicles (Special Purpose Vehicles) sector within the European Automotive Industry.

To improve the quality and safety of Wheelchair Accessible Vehicles on the market throughout Europe.

To work with regulators and legislators to ensure that this small but important sector can continue to manufacture accessible vehicles for the benefit of the disabled people who need to use them.
interests: Business and Industry, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: Automotive Recast Framework Directive (2007/46/EC); the Automotive Framework Regulation (REGULATION (EU) 2018/858) and various associated implementing measures and delegated acts, and the General Safety Regulation (661/2009).
